title: Part One
description: Four months have passed since the visitors first arrived on Earth. They manipulate world opinion in their favor and are determined to eradicate the resistance.

title: Part Two
description: Donovan is reunited with his son and joins the international Resistance headed by Ham Tyler and Chris Farber.

title: Part Three
description: Donovan turns himself over to the aliens in order to save his son. Diana hears her colleagues are plotting against her.
